alert.note: Alert for Lapeer; Macomb; Oakland; St. Clair (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 02 at 5:54PM EST by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT PARTS OF LAPEER...MACOMB...OAKLAND...AND ST. CLAIR COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A snow squall accompanied by wind gusts of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 553 PM EST, a snow squall was along a line extending from near Port Huron to near Capac to near Metamora and moving southeast at 20 MPH. THIS SQUALL WILL BE NEAR... Port Huron and Marysville around 600 PM EST. Armada and Memphis around 610 PM EST. Richmond around 620 PM EST. Rochester around 640 PM EST. New Baltimore around 645 PM EST. Sterling Heights and Clinton around 655 PM EST. Algonac and Harsens Island around 710 PM EST. This includes the following highways... I-94 between mile markers 232 and 273. I-69 between mile markers 171 and 199. M-39 between mile markers 16 and 24. M-53 between mile markers 16 and 24. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. &&
